scripts.build:dev: yarn exec rm -rf common/build || 1 && yarn workspace @workspace/common node dev.js
scripts.analyze: (rm -Rf ./build || 1) && NODE_ENV=development yarn workspaces foreach -pti run -T analyze-webpack
scripts.analyze:server: yarn workspace @workspace/common webpack --json --config dev.js > common/srv.json && yarn dlx webpack-bundle-analyzer common/srv.json
